name: dentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the teeth: She is medically and dentally qualified. It is important to have a clear picture of how a child is changing dentally and skeletally through this period.
More examplesFewer examplesThe advantage of adding fluoride to water is that it helps those who are not dentally conscious.Patients who may benefit from sedation include the dentally fearful and young children.He turned and flashed me his dazzling white, dentally remastered smile.
